bug.author: StpMax
bug.summary: storage_dir not created when mindsdb starts
bug.description: Describe the bug dirs described in config['interface']['datastore']['storage_dir'] and config['interface']['mindsdb_native']['storage_dir'] not created when mindsdb starts To Reproduce 1 change paths to not exists dirs in config.josn 2 run mindsdb module 3 get error FileNotFoundError Expected behavior dist should be created at mindsdb start
